Name: Max Raider
About the game: Max Raider is a top-down 3D action shooter where you fight waves of enemies on procedurally generated arenas. Rest and prepare for the next series of waves by buying a variety of weapons and items from your allies. Protect the Bunker, your only hope for a home. 25+ items, including firearms, hand weapons and healing items 16 unique procedurally generated maps Loot items and cash from defeated foes Use cover and clever tactics to gain advantage over hoards of gradually more difficult foes Compare and analise your playthrough with post-game statistics
Meta Title: Max Raider: Dec 16, 2020, Kairoscope and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Max Raider? Check out the release date (Dec 16, 2020), developer insights from Kairoscope, and a complete game summary.
